Description: Malaria is a life-threatening disease transmitted through the bite of an infected Anopheles mosquito.
Precautions: ['Use mosquito net', 'Apply mosquito repellent', 'Wear full sleeves', 'Avoid stagnant water']

Description: Dengue fever is a mosquito-borne viral infection causing severe flu-like illness.
Diabetes is a chronic health condition that affects how your body turns food into energy.
Precautions: ['Maintain healthy diet', 'Regular exercise', 'Monitor blood sugar', 'Avoid sugary food']

Description: Migraine is a neurological condition that can cause multiple symptoms, including intense headaches.
Precautions: ['Rest in quiet, dark room', 'Apply cold compresses', 'Stay hydrated', 'Use medication']

Description: Common cold is a viral infection of your nose and throat (upper respiratory tract).
Precautions: ['Drink plenty of fluids', 'Rest well', 'Use saline nasal sprays', 'Avoid cold foods']
